p: A study in Guangxi also put forward similar patterns of overlapping risk profile, despite unknown sex and sexual orientation of the HIV‐positive participants [ 15]. Inclusive of 3 reporting drug injection history, HCV sequences of 16 subjects with suspected sexually acquired HCV were mixed with 29 PWID in four clades of subtypes, which were subtypes 1a, 1b, 3b and 6a [ 15]. Although the bootstrap value was not available to validate the phylogenetic clustering between the two high‐risk groups, their intersection within HCV transmission network was inferred from the results [ 15].
